Legacy name for FeasibilityScore in earlier files.
0–1 score combining employment and GRDP per capita (0.60/0.40).
0–1 score from occupied single/duplex housing units (region-level).
1 − HazardRisk_NoFault; composite safety excluding fault distance (gate-only).
Composite: 0.40*EconomyScore + 0.40*Feasibility/Affordability + 0.20*DemandScore (base).
0.50*ProfitabilityScore + 0.50*HazardSafety_NoFault (base).
Scaled flood exposure: (Flood Level − 1)/2.
Scaled storm surge exposure: (Storm Surge Level − 1)/2.
Scaled landslide exposure: (Landslide Level − 1)/2.
Hydrometeorological risk: 0.5*FloodRisk + 0.5*StormSurgeRisk.
0.45*norm(M≥5 count) + 0.35*norm(freq) + 0.20*(1 − norm(depth)).
0.40*EarthquakeRisk + 0.40*RISK_HydroRisk + 0.20*LandslideRisk.
